Description:
SuperSmash is a physics base multiplayer fighting game where you can use different weapons to fight with your frineds.
You can use two weapons at the same time and character is all driven by physics,all action is unpredictable,each fight is physically unique.


Key Feature:
- 2 to 4 players in one multiplayer game（single player mode not supported yet）
- Physics-based combat system
- hold dual weapon
- 45 different weapons
- about 70 different maps
- 7 different map series
-slow motion mode
